Interface CalendarServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalendarServerImpl

    public interface CalendarServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long addEvent(Event e)
      add an event to the server e.id is ignored - the server assigns a new id
      Event getNextEvent(java.lang.String user)
      this method blocks until an event starts for the provided user and then returns the event

      used to register the callback and associate it with the user string.

      remove an event from the database
      void UnregisterCallback(EventCallback ec)

      boolean updateEvent(long id, Event e)
      sets every field of the event with the same id to the new values of e

                    Event e)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        sets every field of the event with the same id to the new values of e

        id -
        e -
        Returns:
